title: Ruzzle v2.0.15 APK [SadeemPC]
description:
Ruzzle v2.0.15
Requirements: Android, varies with device

If you like playing word games then you need to join over 55 million players and try Ruzzle - the fastest word game on the planet! Join over 55 million players in the world's fastest word game! Challenge your friends to see who is the best! Can you find the most words in two minutes?	

- Find words among the scrambled letters, and use the bonus tiles to get as many points as possible. The game is as easy as swiping your finger across the board!
- Ruzzle is fun and fast-paced! Step up to the challenge and defeat your friends or random players. Play against yourfriends, challenge your Twitter followers, play tournaments and climb the ranks!
- Play smart! Create long words and collect points and bonuses to win. Games are played in three rounds, each one when it suits you. Get going as soon as you have two minutes to spare!
- Ruzzle Premium has a wide range of cool premium features, such as loads of statistics, rankings and more. Choose Ruzzle Premium to remove ads and enjoy premium features. 
- Challenge yourself and your friends in Ruzzle!

Games can be played in the following languages:
- English
- French
- German
- Dutch
- Swedish
- Danish
- Norwegian
- Portuguese
- Spanish
- Italian
- Turkish
- Russian
- Greek

WHAT'S NEW:
INFO: Some people have been asking about the "phone state" permission, this is required for us to pause the game when you receive a call.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

Homepage 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=se.maginteractive.rumble
